tool_description: This API helps to query for almost everything that you see PUBLICLY on SHEIN's sites
name: Unofficial SHEIN
title: Unofficial SHEIN

api_list.name: reviews/list
api_list.description: List reviews related to a product

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page index, for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response, for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: comment_rank
optional_parameters.description: Filter comments by rank, from 1 to 5

optional_parameters.name: cat_id
optional_parameters.description: The value of cat_id returned in .../products/list or .../products/search

optional_parameters.name: goods_spu
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'productRelationID' returned in .../products/list or .../products/search

optional_parameters.name: goods_id
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'goods_id' field returned in .../products/list or .../products/search endpoint

api_list.name: products/get-extra-info
api_list.description: Get extra information of a product

required_parameters.name: goods_id
required_parameters.description: The value of 'goods_id' field returned in .../products/list or .../products/search endpoint

optional_parameters.name: brandCode
optional_parameters.description: The value of brand_code returned in .../products/list or .../products/search

optional_parameters.name: cateId
optional_parameters.description: The value of cat_id returned in .../products/list or .../products/search

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'id' field returned in .../countries/list

optional_parameters.name: seriesId
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'seriesId' returned in .../products/list or .../products/search

optional_parameters.name: brandBadge
optional_parameters.description: The value of brand_badge returned in .../products/list or .../products/search

optional_parameters.name: sku
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'goods_sn' returned in .../products/list or .../products/search

api_list.name: products/get-filters
api_list.description: You use this endpoint to build up the filters dynamically

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'attr_filter' field OR {attr_id}_{attr_value_id} returned in .../products/get-filters endpoint. Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : 87_1357-87_710,87_1352,etc...

optional_parameters.name: keywords
optional_parameters.description: You should use the value of 'cateName' or 'word' field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint for best results

optional_parameters.name: cat_id
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'hrefTarget' returned in .../navigations/get-node-content endpoint

api_list.name: products/search
api_list.description: Search products by keywords with options and filters

required_parameters.name: keywords
required_parameters.description: You should use the value of 'cateName' or 'word' field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint for best results

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response, for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page index, for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'attr_filter' field OR {attr_id}_{attr_value_id} returned in .../products/get-filters endpoint. Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : 87_1357-87_710,87_1352,etc...

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : 0-Recommend|7-Top rated|8-Most popular|9-New arrivals|10-Price low to high|11-Price high to low

optional_parameters.name: cat_id
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'hrefTarget' returned in .../navigations/get-node-content endpoint

api_list.name: products/get-reviews
api_list.description: Get brief reviews of a product

optional_parameters.name: goods_spu
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'productRelationID' returned in .../products/list or .../products/search

optional_parameters.name: cat_id
optional_parameters.description: The value of cat_id returned in .../products/list or .../products/search

optional_parameters.name: sku
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'goods_sn' returned in .../products/list or .../products/search

optional_parameters.name: goods_id
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'goods_id' field returned in .../products/list or .../products/search endpoint

api_list.description: Get detailed information of a product

required_parameters.name: goods_id
required_parameters.description: The value of 'goods_id' field returned in .../products/list or .../products/search endpoint

api_list.name: products/list
api_list.description: List products by a category with options and filters

required_parameters.description: The value of 'goodsId' returned in .../navigations/get-node-content endpoint

required_parameters.name: cat_id
required_parameters.description: The value of 'hrefTarget' returned in .../navigations/get-node-content endpoint

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : 0-Recommend|7-Top rated|8-Most popular|9-New arrivals|10-Price low to high|11-Price high to low

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'attr_filter' field OR {attr_id}_{attr_value_id} returned in .../products/get-filters endpoint. Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : 87_1357-87_710,87_1352,etc...

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page index, for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response, for paging purpose

api_list.name: navigations/get-node-content
api_list.description: Get children categories nested in a root category

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of 'id' field returned in .../navigations/get-root endpoint

required_parameters.name: cat_id
required_parameters.description: The value of 'cat_id' field returned in .../navigations/get-tabs endpoint

api_list.description: Get root categories related to a tab

required_parameters.description: The value of 'id' field returned in .../navigations/get-tabs endpoint

countries/detail
api_list.description: Get detailed information of a country

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'value' field returned in .../countries/list endpoint

api_list.name: countries/list
api_list.description: List all available and supported countries. This endpoint provides meta data for other endpoints.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unofficial-shein.p.rapidapi.com/countries/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unofficial-shein.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://unofficial-shein.p.rapidapi.com/countries/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unofficial-shein.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: auto-complete
api_list.description: Get suggestions by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: word
required_parameters.description: Any term or phrase that you are familiar with
